channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware vCloud Director for Service Providers (vCD)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware vCloud Director for Service Providers (vCD)

item.title: CVE-2019-5523|2024-08-04T20:01:51.415Z -- vmware -- vmware%20vcloud%20director%20for%20service%20providers%20%28vcd%29
item.description: VMware vCloud Director for Service Providers 9.5.x prior to 9.5.0.3 update resolves a Remote Session Hijack vulnerability in the Tenant and Provider Portals. Successful exploitation of this issue may allow a malicious actor to access the Tenant or Provider Portals by impersonating a currently logged in session.
